// Pivot 0, 0
int right flipper[18] = {
	54, 2,
	1, 43,
	1, 49,
	4, 53,
	12, 53,
	69, 19,
	69, 10,
	62, 2,
	54, 2
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float right flipper[18] = {
	0.771429f, 0.037736f,
	0.014286f, 0.811321f,
	0.014286f, 0.924528f,
	0.057143f, 1.000000f,
